long_description: The Petzl Tikkina(R) Headlamp is perfect for up-close lighting, whether you're camping, lounging in a hut or using it when the power goes out. It outputs 60 lumens and lights up objects 30m away. Single high-output LED provides even, white lighting throughout your field of vision with no blank spots in the beam; lens optimizes the reach of the beam to 30m. Push-button switch easily changes between high and low output settings so you can choose the appropriate light level for the task at hand. LED outputs 60 lumens on high and 15 lumens on low; throws light 30m on high and 15m on low. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up 120 hrs. of run time on low and 60 hrs. on high; compatible with rechargeable NiMH and lithium batteries. Petzl Tikkina Headlamp battery case opens easily for changing the batteries. Elastic headband adjusts easily for the right fit; headband is washable. IPX4 water resistance offers protection against sprayed water.
short_description: The Petzl Tikkina(R) Headlamp is perfect for up-close lighting, whether you're camping, lounging in a hut or using it when the power goes out. It outputs 60 lumens and lights up objects 30m away.
